name: part_002
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel in a Santa outfit welcomes the audience to her Christmas live and mentions calling her friends.
Shirogane Noel and Yukihana Lamy perform the song 'Suki! Yuki! Maji Magic'.
Shirogane Noel, Shiranui Flare, and Houshou Marine perform the song 'Hajimete no Koi ga Owaru Toki'.
scenes.song_name: Hajimete no Koi ga Owaru Toki

subtitles.original: 一人はちょっと寂しいのでお友達も呼んでます。
subtitles.english: It's a bit lonely by myself, so I'm calling my friends too.

subtitles.original: お友達とクリスマスライブ歌って踊るぞー！
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing and dance at a Christmas live with my friends!

subtitles.original: わーい！ 楽しむぞー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's have fun!

subtitles.original: Ah ホイップしたケーキのような街は
subtitles.english: Ah, the city is like a whipped cake

subtitles.original: 好き！ 雪！ 本気マジック
subtitles.english: Love! Snow! Real magic

subtitles.original: 空がくれる コンフェッティは
subtitles.english: The confetti the sky gives us

subtitles.original: 冬のフェスタ祝う天使の羽よ Woo
subtitles.english: Are angel wings celebrating the winter festa Woo

subtitles.original: Woo
subtitles.english: Woo

subtitles.original: 白銀の国へ 出かけよう Go Go Go
subtitles.english: Let's head to the silver country Go Go Go

subtitles.original: 雪の汽車が 街を駆け Choo Choo Choo
subtitles.english: The snow train runs through the town Choo Choo Choo

subtitles.original: 絵本みたいな景色を 君に見せてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll show you a scenery like a picture book

subtitles.original: 願い込めて 呪文さあ
subtitles.english: Put your heart into the spell, now

subtitles.original: さあ！ 唱えて！ さんはい！
subtitles.english: Now! Recite it! One, two!

subtitles.original: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Snow Miku!
subtitles.english: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Snow Miku!

subtitles.original: ツンと冷たい 季節が好き Love love love
subtitles.english: I like the stinging cold season Love love love

subtitles.original: アイスも魔法も 溶けないように ヒュー ヒュー ヒュー
subtitles.english: So neither ice nor magic melt, whew whew whew

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままじゃダメなの？
subtitles.english: Is it no good to stay like this forever?

subtitles.original: やっぱりドキドキしたいな
subtitles.english: I really want to feel my heart race

subtitles.original: 冷たい冬の風が頬をかすめる
subtitles.english: The cold winter wind brushes my cheek

subtitles.original: 吐いた息で両手をこすった

subtitles.original: 街はイルミネーション 魔法をかけたみたい
subtitles.english: The town is lit up, like a spell was cast

subtitles.original: 裸の街路樹キラキラ
subtitles.english: The bare roadside trees are sparkling

subtitles.original: どうしても言えなかった この気持ち 抑えつけた
